mapper.insert: insert into enterprise (id, ctime, username, password, indid, stime, etime, photo,name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update enterprise set ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, indid = #{indid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ctime, username, password, indid, stime, etime, photo, name from enterprise
